Blog.post: aaahhh...im s0o0o tired!! lol...but i had a fun weekend, n i jus g0t bac las nite like r0und...10...n den im leavin again 2m0r!! haha...yay!! sat - went 2 dis 1 mall, hella tite. g0t s0m stuff n den i went n ate yup...g0n fr0m h0me da WHOLE day((thank g0d!!))...den i went n rented 50 first dates. g00d m0vie, made me laugh. sun - went t0 church in da m0rnin...saw s0m fine guys i hadnt seen in 4eva...yeh yeh!! haha...n den rite afta church i was walkin 0ut w. nickie, n i tripped n i was like O0OH SHIT!! oopsies...... but yeh den nickie came 0va mah h0use, den we went 2 da m0vies n saw a cinderella st0ry...it was cute. den, we didnt wanna g0 h0me yet, s0 we went walkin r0und dis place by derr n i swear...we like alm0st g0t raped lol...we were like AAAAHHH!! but it was fun i gues lol. den we went bac 2 mah h0use, n den we went 0va nickies h0use, had margaritas, n i spent da nite derr. M0nDay - i was at nickies...hmm...oh yeh! we went 2 da m0vies n saw The N0teb00k...it was s0o0o0o g00d. like 1 of da best m0vies i*ve seen. yup. den, we went 2 mc d0nalds, den we went bac 2 her h0use. den mah m0m came 0va f0r a lil...yeh, umm...den nickies m0m made margaritas s0 we had d0se again lol. den we stayed up till like 430 in da m0rnin, n i was like laughin f0r n0 reas0n at all lol. den nickie started scarrin me n shit haha...g00d times. TuES - i was still at nickies h0use lol. we went 2 da anti0ch mall, chilled derr f0r a while((s0o0o many h0t buys again!! lol)). den, we went bac 2 her h0use, ate, den we went 2 TJ Max bcuz it was on da way 2 mah h0use. den we went 2 mah h0use stayed derr till like...11 den nickie had 2 g0. 2day...has been kinda b0ring lol. i jus g0t up, f0lded da t0wels n clothes n put dem away, emptied da dishwasher n put dirrty dishes inside, cleaned mah r00m...n dats pretty much it! lol...but i gta pack bcuz 2m0r im leaving f0r................................................... DiSnEyLaNd!!

i am...s0o0o mad rite n0w!! gRrRr...i was SuPp0SeD t0 g0 t0 Disneyland w. all mah friends, but as usual...s0mthin aLwYz hasta g0 wr0ng. mah dad didn*t want me t0 g0 since there*s g0nna b n0 chaper0nes n we*re g0in w. guys. s0 mah m0m went l00kin f0r 0ther things f0r me t0 g0 t0 n she was like instead 0f g0ing t0 disneyland, y0u cang0 t0 *CaNcUn* 0r *0rLaNd0 Fl0RiDa*. s0 i was like umm...0k dat s0unds fun. s0 i was like 0k, g0ing to 0rLaNd0 w. nickie wuld b t0tally fun bcuz derrs disney world, AND the beach. s0 what d0es my dad d0?? he calls n makes reservations for me n nickie...but also himself, my m0m, n nickies wh0le family. s0 n0w, nickie and me r stuk w. da wh0le family which isn*t g0ing t0 be t0 fun. o well...im glad we get t0 g0 t0 florida th0. but i HELLA wanted t0 g0 t0 disneyland w. all mah friends!! it wulda been s0o0o much fun!! n i wuldnt have mah parents there. i*ve been w. dem ALLLL summer!! o well...derrs relly n0thin i can d0 b0ut it. s0 yeh i gues in like...2 weeks im g0in t0 fl0rida...w. 0ut all mah friends, n mah wh0le family...FUN!... yesterday n today have been pretty...b0ring((as usual)). but i*ve been d0in l0tta thnkn b0ut s0m1...n it sux s0o0o much!! i went 0ut w. dis guy 4 a while, n like he treated me s0 g00d n n0w i l00k bac at it, n i feel like i was jus a t0tal bitch t0 him s0mtimes. pe0ple wuld tell me aLL dis stuff b0ut him wen we were g0in 0ut n shit...n stupid me, i believed it n st0pped likin him. wut made it even w0rse was dat i didnt even break up w. him wen i l0st feelings. s0 den i finally br0ke w. him, l0tta things happened n we wernt talkin...yeh but t0 make a RELLY l0ng st0ry sh0rt, we r...relly g00d friends n0w, n im relly glad...except im startin t0 miss him. like weALWYZ talk n weneva we hang 0ut we have s0o0o much fun 2gether. n he makes it seem s0...i dunn0 h0w t0 say it but its like...jus weird. n s0o0o many pe0ple r like yeh y0u 2 are g0n bac 2getha n blah blah blah. but i dunn0. it jus kinda feels like he messes w. mah head s0mtimes n he confuses me s0 much. i kinda regret g0in 0ut w. him...like i feel like we were kinda rushed int0 gettin 2gether but yeh. like if we had waited n g0n 0ut maybe a little later, mayb we still w0ulda been 2gether. but i dunno,i gues its jus made me realize dat wen it c0ms 2 guys...there is no 2nd chance...n it sux so much. but newayz...besides all dat...kinda g00d news i gues lol. me n mah nickie mite b able t0 g0 t0 disneyland w. da pe0ple fr0m 0akland we kn0w fr0m dance...if we g0 it sh0uld b HELLLA fun!! no parents, LOTTA fine guys...n den 0ur friends...wut culd b better?? n wed b derr 4 like...5 days...s0unds fun t0 me! n den wen we c0m bac, after like...3 days, we*re g0in d0wn s0uth again...but 0ur parents*LL b derr((grrrr...)). but im pretty sure we*LL jus walk r0und w.0ut dem lol. but wen we d0 g0, we*re g0nna g0 t0 L0ng beach...omg i LOOOVE it derr!! derrs southcoast plaze sh0pping center...dat place is s0o0o damn big!! yup...n den we*re g0nna g0 t0 Universal Studi0s...dat*LL b fun 2. n den we*re g0nna g0 t0 San Diego n jus chiLL r0und da beach...yay!! we*re g0n g0 b0dy b0ardin n shit...s0o0o much fun, but y0u get s0 many bruises...o well. yup so it shuld b fun. xOx.*.LaUrEn.*.xOx

w0w...2day was s0o0o...b0ring!! i was supp0sed t0 g0 t0 SaNTa CruZ, but mah m0mmaS bac was b0therin her. o0oh well. s0 yeh i was pretty much stuck at h0me, d0in n0thin n aLL mah friends culdnt d0 nethin eitha...which suked. mmmhmmm... YeSterRdaY...was pretty fun. i went 0ut w. mah m0m bcuz she had 2 find s0m things...in *PiTTsBuRg* daaamn...s0o0o many fine guys!! LoL...den afta dat...we went 0va 2 mah cuzins in *AnTi0cH*...m0re guyS...aLL his damn neighb0rs r s0o0o h0t lol. den afta we*re drivin h0me, n mah m0m 0uTTa n0where is like y0u wanna learn t0 drive?? i was like...umm...0k. s0 yeh she t00k me into this big empty parking l0t n had me drive r0und. den she t00k me h0me, n den mah dad t00k me driving...n i aLm0sT crashed mah m0m*s car...o0ops! yup...s0 den at like...8:30 0r s0mthin, *ChRiS* caLLs me n is like yeh...im by yr h0use y0u wanna kick it?? s0 mah m0m was like yeh he can c0m 0va.so he came 0va...dad wasnt 2 happy b0ut it...o well...hes gta get 0va it. s0 newayz mah parents were upstairs n we were jus...d0wnstairs watchin TV 0r w/e lol. so den we g0t pretty b0red n we were g0n g0 0ut n we were drivin, denhis LiL br0tha caLLs him n is like yeh umm...i need y0u t0 c0m pik me up n0w. n chris was like yr still at da park rite?? lol...his br0tha is like nah im at s0m1's h0use, buh i dunn0 where i am...lol dat was greeat. yeh s0 den chris had 2 take me h0me t0 g0 find his br0tha...but its kewl...we can jus kick it s0m 0tha time. s0 i g0 h0me 0r w/e n like mah dad was kinda...weird lol but n0w its kewl...i d0n gta w0rry b0ut him trippin wen guys wanna c0m 0va!! yeh yeh...FINALLY!! s0 yeh...umm...d0n thnk i did nethin else. but i was s0o0o happy i g0t t0 see chris!! i hadnt SEEN him since dis greek festival we went 2 which was like...2 M0NTHS AGO!! buh yeh...derrs gta b m0re damn festivals...s0 much fun. but yeh i cant thnk 0f nethin else rite n0w...... -xOx-hUgS kiSSeS-xOx-

***HaPpY 4th 0f JuLy!!*** 0k...s0 t0day was preTTy fun. I went t0 Suisun City w. mah m0m n mah dad. we went n ate at this place called Athenian GriLL. iT was pretty g00d i gues. Then we jusT Like waLked r0und ova derr...n i got s0m stuff. s0 it was a pretty g00d day. s0 after we came h0me, mah m0m teLLs me dis thing came in da mail f0r me yesterday...s0mthin bout entering into the Miss Teenage Calif0rnia Sc0Larship Pageant. s0 yeh mah m0m wants me t0 d0 it bcuz she thinx i*LL d0 g00d in it. im n0t shure if i wanna d0 it th0 but i g0tta make up mah mind fast bcuz all da paperwork n 0tha stuff needs t0 be in bef0re July 31st. mmhmm...s0 dats aLL dat happened t0day...buh i mite go 0ut lata...dunno th0. aight well ima b0unce... xOx.*.Lauren.*.xOx

h3y h3y...s0 yeh...this is mah first blog. Today was pretty...b0riNg!! ugh...jus got up did som stuff ar0und da house n den went to som book stores w. mah m0m((yeh...dat was REEELLY fun...))n on da way there all she did was lecture me bout summer sch00l...wow...that was preeetty interestin. 0tha then that...didnt do nethin lol. Yesterday was pretty fun tho((well...kinda)). I went ova mah friend cecilys house like round 1...den jeremy came. So jeremy jus kinda sat derr for a while bcuz cecily and me were gettin redy bcuz we were gon take pics at da mall. So cecilys sis t00k us n we went n t00k da pics. de were aight i gues...but da poses da lady made us do were like aLLL da same but w/e its kewl. s0 then we got hungry n decided t0 g0 t0 mcdonalds. lol...jeremy n me had a f00d fite w. the stupid fries. haha...den there were dese guys in derr that cecily thot were hot so i went ova derr n i was like yeh mah friend ova derr thnx u guys r h0t. lol den i left. they prolly th0t i was crazy but o well i don care. oh yeh...i saw LeXi n aLySSa derr t0 ((aww...i luv em! lol))...n we saw miLaN derr t0 dat was kewl i hadnt seen her in HELLA days. mmmhmmm...yeh dats wen mah day started gettin bad... mah m0m called me n was HELLA piSSed bcuz i wasnt d0in g00d in summa sc00L. but she was heLLa trippin its jus summa sc00L i d0n even gta go 2 it. so she was all yeh well ima b pikin up from mah way home from work n don ask t0 stay L0nger n den she hung up 0n me. mah mom w0uLda been at mah friends house at like 515 n it was alredy like 4 so i was like daaamn. but den we went 0utside n i got mah m0m t0 lemme stay tiLL like 8 so it was kewl. THEN...we decided t0 g0 swimming. so i was changin rite...n jeremy jus like WALKS in n im jus wearin mah th0ng so i was like 0mg!...lol so i was like yellin at him t0 get 0ut but he jus came in again but den he left. s0 yeh we g0 t0 da p00L n im wearin mah shorts on t0p of mah bathing suit n jeremy jus like picks me up n thr0ws me in...i was s0o0o mad at him!! lol...but den i t00k his shirt n threw it in so u n0e i was aight afta dat lol. so den it was me, jeremy, cecily, justine((cec cuz)) in da p00L n aLL da gurLs were trynna pants jeremy lol...but i was da 1 dat ended up gettin pantsd...AGAIN lol. yeh so we were jus d0in weird shit at da p00L lol...yeeh...so den we went bac 2 cec h0use n like i dunn0 wut cec was d0in lol so like jeremy n me were jus fightin like we alwyz do...so den like i sLapped his a$$ 4 pantsin me...well i sLapped it c0upLe of times lol. so den me n jeremy r in like da famiLy r00m n he sLaPs mah a$$ HEEELLLA hard!! i was like DAAAMN lol. but yeh newayz we jus hung out at her h0use... den mah parents piked me up n mah m0m was jus hella pissed still n yeh i don wanna get into dat... well yeh ima g0 n0w... ~~~>LaUr3n
